alert.note: Alert for Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:39PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Newton County through 215 PM CDT... At 138 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jasper, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper... Pruitt... Piercetown... Carver... Vendor... Hasty... Gum Springs in Newton County... Mt Sherman... Mt Judea... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations
